price: Nabiyyiin tokkollee isaanitti dhufee yoo isatti qishinan (baacan) malee hin hafne.
arabic: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن نَّبِيٍّ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wamā yatīhim min nabiyyin illā kānū bihi yastahziūna
